name: Red and Blue Demo
description:
You and your sibling are lost in the woods, and then somehow what get separated from each other and get trapped in the same dungeon, but in different rooms. Can you and your brother escape this place and finally see the light of the surface?

---------=========Instructions=======--------------------

Use arrow keys to move.

Dodge spikes and reach you and your brother to the gates to proceed to the next level!

There  are currently 4 levels.

RECOMENDED VOLUME: 20

All levels are possible! You just need to think about your moves. (This includes level 4)

----------==============Credits and Notes===========-------------

Credits are in-game. (At the end of the demo)

This is a itch.io port of my scratch game Red and Blue Demo, which was made for the

#XamJam hosted by @xamuil2 on scratch. (For more info about the jam, go here.)

On scratch, I am known as Megayipman.
